Title: reinterpretAsUInt256
Description: Performs byte reinterpretation by treating the input value as a value of type UInt256. Unlike CAST, the function does not attempt to preserve the original value - if the target type is not able to represent the input type, the output is meaningless.
x: value to byte reinterpret as UInt256. (U)Int*, Float, Date, DateTime, UUID, String or FixedString.
Reinterpreted value x as UInt256. UInt256.
Examples: SELECT    toUInt128(257) AS x,    toTypeName(x),    reinterpretAsUInt256(x) AS res,    toTypeName(res)
